Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:



Imprisoner grunted as a plasma charge hit his heavily armored chest.  
Switching the setting of his weapon, he fired a destructive sonic blast in an 
arc 6 ft high and 3 ft wide off at Hot Rod.

Predator got to one knee, avoiding the plasma charges.  He fired a grenade 
off at Hot Rod's back.

Choran rolled, getting up, he fired two blasts off at the back of Hot Rod's 
left knee from his heavy laser rifle.
